alert.note: Alert for Graham (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 1:38AM MST until September 13 at 2:30AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Graham County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 230 AM MST. * At 138 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Carlos, or 26 miles east of Globe, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly remote areas of northwestern Graham County near San Carlos and Peridot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
